title: Is Free Agency Actually Free? | The Answer
description:
Chris and Seerat are joined by The Ringer’s Rob Mahoney to talk about his Ringer Ph.D. video explaining how NBA contracts work (1:27). Then they touch on a variety of topics related to the offseason (3:05), including whether draft picks matter, if teams get punished for drafting well, and much more.

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Seerat Sohi
Guest: Rob Mahoney
Production Assistant: Isaiah Blakely
